column5: http://photobucket.com" target="_blank"> Well i feel great, met some new friends and caught me my first Walleye. I'm thankful to a few people who made it all happen. I was supposed to have a partner for the trip but he backed out on me last second so i had to make other arrangements so i posted on the BOQ thread and noticed Brian (Slowpoke) was asking if anyone needed a ride well i was in on that. Thanks for the Ride and the company Brian. Since i was not bringing my boat he also offered me a spot in his boat. I also found my accommodations this way asking if anyone wanted to split a cottage or had an extra spot for a straggler LOL A few more people came to my rescue Shelly (Lady Walleye), Chuck (Big Chevy 4x4) Joey & Tybo and Roy Thanks so much guys it was great bunking with you's. It was really good that Merlands screwed up the reservation cause we landed in this beauty for the first night!!! The next day we had to move to a little smaller cottage but it was great too! Well the first night was really windy and we ended up hanging out meeting people and and talking about tomorrows Strategy.. Well the next day after a headache and a puke!! Brian and I headed out to see if he could put me on my first Walleye and sure enough he comes through for me! 4.5 lbs not too shabby...... See how happy he is for me!!! The next day we head out again with Carol (Bly) to see if we can get Brian his PB. and land a few more for the team!!! Sure enough he comes through again. 9.6 lbs Smile for the camera!!! After that it was party and Potluck time! Congrats to Chuck for Winning the Tourney and the trophy!!! Nice Looking Fish. Well that about sums it up it was nice meeting you Percher,Mike the pike,Dougg,Lexxington, Vatordude&son,Kevin ,Fishinslead, Bill Parker,corey,Oldfart, Ted&gagets,Terry, Danno,Slug Wayne and everyone else i cant think of cause i was intoxicated LOL Hope to see you all again at Lakair!! Cheers BMM Heres a few more pics !!! Check out that Coffee.
Well it's about time   Glad things worked out for you and congrats on your first Walleye/Pickeral  Maureen

Congrats on the walleye. Looks like everyone had a great time, despite some high winds and the puking thing. You might want to remember to keep the high winds to your back while puking. Wish I could have made this one. Might get down for a day this coming weekend.
It's nice to read all the different Quinte reports, everyone has a different perspective. Thanks for posting Mike, sounds like you had a good time and met some good people.
Hey Mike, nice report, it was fun hanging out with you.
Thanks for the report, Mike. Congrats on #1. Nice seeing you on the weekend.

Great report Mike, it made me feel like I was right there!!! It was a pleasure sharing a ride and my boat with you. I'd do it again anytime. Congrat's on your first and personal best wally, can't wait to help you upgrade! -Brian
very nice report, thanks for sharing with us.

Congrats on your first Walleye Mike... wtg  We're all glad we could help you out.. and sharing a cottage with you was easy.. we hardly new you were there...  Glad you enjoyed your first BOQ trip too.... It sure was a great time..
good report and congrats on your first

Sounds like you had an incredible weekend Mike and congrats to you on your 1st ever pickeral and the same to Brian for his Personal Best  There weren't alot of fish caught last weekend from the sounds of the reports, but a few folks set new benchmarks for themselves and that's always a good thing !!
Great report Mike!  It was great seeing you again...I'm sure we'll hook at least once or twice next year.

~~~It was great meeting you too bud, you being sick reminds me of a time I and a buddy were going Ice Phishen for Trout, and he had a case of food poisoning, but he still showed up and we had to stop every so often so he could hurl, and as I sat there and waited I asked him was there any Corn in the mix, it would be great for baiting the hole, which only made him sicker~~~Alas there was no corn
Great report, and once again, congrats on the Pickerel.  Did you eat the cheeks yet  You are welcome in my cabin any time bud.  It was a pleasure.  And thanks again for breakfast  Joey
Great too meet you Mike, Wish we could have hooked up on the Sunday.  Come spring, your always welcome to join me for Salmon,  Thanks Paul
Thanks everyone it was great meeting you too!!!
Nice Meeting ya mike... and I love the money shot, thanks
